title: nn.Embedding broken for half
body_html:
import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

encoder = nn.Embedding(10, 100)
encoder = encoder.cuda().half()
inp = Variable(torch.arange(10).cuda().long())

out = encoder(inp)
loss = out.sum()
loss.backward()
